name: Ext_R2_SearchParameter_xpathUsage
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.SearchParameter.xpathUsage for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents SearchParameter.xpathUsage from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SearchParameter|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: How the search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating the xpath query.
element.comment: `SearchParameter.xpathUsage` maps to R5 `SearchParameter.processingMode`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: How the search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating the xpath query.
element.comment: `SearchParameter.xpathUsage` maps to R5 `SearchParameter.processingMode`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: How a search parameter relates to the set of elements returned by evaluating its xpath query.
